name: Konjac Powder (Amorphophallus Muelleri)
description: Collaborating with local sources in Eastern Indonesia, especially East Nusa Tenggara, we process top-quality raw materials in Surabaya and Jakarta. Our continuous production is consistently exported to countries like Japan.

name: Turmeric Powder (Curcuma Longa)
description: Working with local sources in Eastern Indonesia, we process top-quality raw materials in Surabaya and Jakarta. Our ongoing production is exported to countries like Japan and China, where ginger is used for sweeteners and herbal products.

name: Giant Ginger Powder (Zingiber Officinale Rosc.)
description: Working with local sources in Eastern Indonesia, we process top-quality raw materials in Surabaya and Jakarta. Our ongoing production is exported to several countries, where turmeric's benefits are widely used in herbal blends and processed foods.
